p: For CAZyme annotation, Prokka gene prediction was used to obtain the sequences of genes. Amino acid sequences were compared with the dbCAN database version 07312018 using the run-dbcan.py script (Zhang et al., 2018) and HMMER 3.2.1 (Eddy, 2011). CAZymes with an e-value ≤ 1E −30 were considered for further annotation and their most probable target substrates were identified based on the genes with characterized functions in the CAZy database ( http://www.cazy.org; Lombard et al., 2014). Functions of predicted genes were annotated with the hmmsearch function in HMMER 3.2.1, using the FOAM database as a source of HMMs for relevant genes (Prestat et al., 2014). FOAM functions with an e-value ≤ 1E −30 were considered for further annotation. In the case of genes with more than one hit in the dbCAN and the FOAM databases, the function with the lowest e-value was selected.
